title: High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) Explained
description: HIIT workouts combine short bursts of intense activity with recovery periods, offering efficiency and improved cardiovascular health.

sections.title: What is HIIT?
sections.content: High-Intensity Interval Training alternates between intense effort and active recovery. It maximizes calorie burn and improves endurance in less time.

sections.title: Benefits of HIIT
sections.content: HIIT improves cardiovascular health, burns fat efficiently, and can be adapted to bodyweight, cardio, or strength-based exercises.
